body: Wondering how serious she is. In the end, Miori did say she starts looking forward to meet Kouhei, her boyfriend, again. But it might just be to provoke her brother because he fucked her harder when he's angry about his sister talking about other guy. At least that's how she managed to make him came inside her (saying her boyfriend might want to have sex and could came inside her, unlike her brother). So she planned on dating her boyfriend until graduation. | I do hope it gets more complicated, like she starts to really love both in different ways.
